div.div: Construction for Bristol's new middle school is underway at the site of the current Vance Middle School. Here you can see renderings and construction photos of the new school! Check back for updates as work progresses!
Bristol Tennessee City Schools is actively monitoring the status of the COVID-19 virus in order to remain aware of current information and guidance.

img.alt: The Dude poses with excited Haynesfield students.
img.title: The Dude poses with excited Haynesfield students.

div.div: Haynesfield Elementary School students were the first big winners for 2020 as the Be Present! Prize Patrol stormed the school for the Be Present! Attendance Challenge!
The Viking Hall Pool was filled with excited swimmers from across the region on Friday, March 6, as Tennessee High hosted the 10th Annual Adaptive Aquatics swim meet.

img.alt: Lilly and Manno named National Merit Finalists
img.title: Lilly and Manno named National Merit Finalists

a.title: Lilly and Manno advance to Finalist standing

div.a: Lilly and Manno advance to Finalist standing
div.div: THS Seniors Ryan Lilly and Matthew Manno have advanced as 2019 Finalists in the National Merit Scholarship Program.

a.title: Congratulations to BTCS Teachers of the Year!

div.a: Congratulations to BTCS Teachers of the Year!
div.div: From eight district-wide nominees, three teachers were selected to represent BTCS in this year's state Teacher of the Year Award!
Ask around Bristol and you will quickly learn a claim to fame for Anderson Elementary School. Anderson is the place where heart meets innovation in education!

div.p: Our website is in compliance with Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act and Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act. If you have questions or concerns regarding the accessibility of the website or if you are unable to access information on the website, you may email or call the Technology Department at (423) 652-9363.
